attributes.action: Legally require slower traffic to allow queues to pass
attributes.additional_details:
Amend the traffic act to make it an offence to not allow queues to pass when driving below the speed limit. Suggested limits may be that if driving  5 mph or more below the legal limit and a queue of four or more vehicles has formed behind, the lead vehicle is required to pull over as soon as possible to let the traffic clear.
This could be enforced as an offence under driving without due care and attention.
Similar requirements exist as recommendations but would benefit from being codified into law.
